description:
Pravah focuses on supply chain optimization, logistics management, and operations
                                excellence. Members engage in supply chain simulations, industry visits, and workshops
                                on modern logistics technologies.

The club organizes activities including supply chain case studies, warehouse management
                                simulations, logistics planning exercises, and interactions with supply chain professionals.
                                Members learn about inventory management, distribution networks, and supply chain analytics.

Through Pravah, students gain practical knowledge of supply chain operations, understand
                                the importance of efficient logistics, and develop skills that are essential for careers in
                                operations, supply chain management, and logistics.
